Title: All In
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Lucas O'Connor, Sean Hennen (story editor), Erik Mountain (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson
Plot: After saving Leon Tao yet again, Reese goes to Atlantic City to watch over a retiree who's losing a fortune in the casino. HR smears Szymanski so that he can't testify at a Russian mob trial and Carter risks her life trying to clear him.
